article.title: QinetiQ North America Receives $56.4 Million Contract for TALON Robots
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: QinetiQ North America has received a $56.4 million contract for purchase and delivery of TALON GEN IV robots, repair parts, spare kits and other related equipment and services from the Naval Surface Warfare Center, Indian Head, Maryland, for the Naval EOD Technical Division.
